review_data.title: Good food, nice atmosphere, recommended
review_data.content: Visited this location for a business diner. Would definitely visit this restaurant for a private occasion also. Good food, nice and kind service, nice location. We had a table in the garden, very cosy. Not cheap, this is Switzerland, but worth visiting. I recommend.
